title: Settings
subtitle: Where to send admin requests and how to authenticate

apiBaseUrl.label: Admin API base URL
apiBaseUrl.help: In production, leave this empty when served from the bridge server. In dev, set to e.g. <mono>http://127.0.0.1:8787</mono>.
apiBaseUrl.schemeTip: Tip: include http:// or https:// (e.g. http://127.0.0.1:8787)

auth.label: Authentication
auth.help: Sign in (or Change token) uses the server ADMIN_API_TOKEN. Client tokens are for MCP clients and are managed in Tokens.

notes.label: Notes
notes.help: The Admin UI cannot set server environment variables. The token you enter must match what the server was started with.

server.label: Server
server.signInRequired: Sign in to view server-side settings.
server.keySelectionHelp: Persists on the server. When unset, it falls back to <mono>TAVILY_KEY_SELECTION_STRATEGY</mono> (<mono>round_robin</mono> or <mono>random</mono>).

searchSourceMode.label: Search source mode
searchSourceMode.help: Determines which search API to use. 'Combined' queries both in parallel and merges results.
searchSourceMode.braveUnavailableWarning: Warning: Brave Search is not configured. This option will fail.
searchSourceMode.combinedUnavailableWarning: Warning: Combined mode requires active API keys for BOTH Tavily and Brave.
searchSourceMode.costNote: Note: Combined mode queries both APIs in parallel (2x cost per search).

research.label: Tavily Research
research.help: Enable or disable the tavily_research tool. When disabled, the tool is hidden from clients and calls are rejected. Useful when your Tavily plan does not include research credits.

rotation.label: Rotation behavior
rotation.help: Key selection is evaluated per upstream request attempt and will fail over to another key on invalid/limited keys.

pill.envVars: Server must be started with <mono>ADMIN_API_TOKEN</mono> and <mono>KEY_ENCRYPTION_SECRET</mono>.

toast.signInRequiredMessage: Sign in with the admin token to update server settings.
toast.authFailedMessage: Admin token is invalid. It must match the bridge server environment variable ADMIN_API_TOKEN.
toast.notFoundMessage: Check the Admin API base URL and ensure the bridge server exposes /admin/api/* routes.
toast.networkErrorMessage: Could not reach Admin API. In local dev, start bridge-server at http://127.0.0.1:8787 and rely on the Vite /admin/api proxy (leave base URL empty), or set base URL explicitly.
toast.goToLoginMessage: Go to Login and enter the server ADMIN_API_TOKEN first.
